bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Illness Sign if of breathing with an obvious acceleration of frequency and expansion of depth. Sheng ji zong lu 聖濟總錄 卷 27: 治陽毒傷寒，遍身壯熱，大喘上氣，燥悶，妙應湯方 , “Recipe for the ‘decoction with wondrous responses’ to cure from yang poison and harm caused by cold, with strong heat affecting the entire body, massive panting with rising qi, restlessness and heart-pressure”.
